name: Server Hell
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49!

'Server Hell' is a game about a poor soul stuck in an office, forced to do various tasks in order to escape.

Players must race to complete their assigned tasks before their reality becomes to unstable to handle.

Hope you aren't afraid of the dark...

Controls:

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Run - Shift

Jump - Space

Interact - E

Toggle Map - Tab

Pause - P or Esc

Drop Equipped Item - Q

Throw Equipped Item - Right-Click
